dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
C. Cortes
C. J. Burges
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a collection of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images of digits from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: F. Chollet
dcterms:description: The IMDB dataset is a binary sentiment classification dataset consisting of movie reviews. Each review is labeled as either positive or negative, and the dataset is commonly used for training models in natural language processing.
dcterms:title: IMDB

dcterms:creator: F. Chollet
dcterms:description: The 20 Newsgroups dataset is a collection of approximately 20,000 newsgroup documents, partitioned across 20 different newsgroups. It is widely used for text classification and clustering tasks.
dcterms:title: 20 Newsgroup
